item.title: MIUI V12.0.9.0.QCSRUXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9C NFC Russia
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9C NFC Russia

Codename: angelican

Version: V12.0.9.0.QCSRUXM | 10.0

Size: 3.6 GB

MD5: 5311370ff0a22557fd2734c6c8a8613e

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2021. Increased system security.
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off

Download: Here
